description: When NVDA starts, this add-on checks the status of the Windows sound system and, if the sound is turned off, turns it on.
changelog: Fully adapted the add-on for compatibility with NVDA 2026.

translations.description: Wenn NVDA gestartet wird, überprüft diese Erweiterung den Status des Windows-Soundsystems und schaltet den Ton ein, falls er ausgeschaltet ist.
translations.changelog: Fully adapted the add-on for compatibility with NVDA 2026.

translations.description: Cuando NVDA se inicia, este complemento comprueba el estado del sistema de sonido de Windows y, si el sonido está desactivado, lo activa.
translations.changelog: Fully adapted the add-on for compatibility with NVDA 2026.

translations.description: Cando NVDA se inicia, este complemento comproba o estado do sistema de son de Windows e, se o son está desactivado, actívao.
translations.changelog: Fully adapted the add-on for compatibility with NVDA 2026.

translations.description: Controlla all'avvio di NVDA lo stato del sistema audio di Windows, se il volume è disattivato verrà riattivato.
translations.changelog: Fully adapted the add-on for compatibility with NVDA 2026.

translations.description: Gdy NVDA się uruchamia, ten dodatek sprawdza stan dźwięku Windows i jeśli dźwięk jest wyciszony, włącza go.
translations.changelog: Fully adapted the add-on for compatibility with NVDA 2026.

translations.description: NVDA başladığında, bu eklenti Windows ses sisteminin durumunu kontrol eder ve ses kapalıysa ya da belirlenen seviyenin altındaysa açar ve belirlenmiş seviyeye getirir.
translations.changelog: Fully adapted the add-on for compatibility with NVDA 2026.

translations.description: Коли NVDA запускається, цей додаток перевіряє стан звукової системи Windows і, якщо звук вимкнено, вмикає його.
translations.changelog: Fully adapted the add-on for compatibility with NVDA 2026.

translations.description: Khi khởi động NVDA, add-on này sẽ kiểm tra trạng thái hệ thống âm thanh của Windows. Nếu nó bị tắt thì bật lên.
translations.changelog: Fully adapted the add-on for compatibility with NVDA 2026.

translations.description: 当 NVDA 启动时，此插件会检查 Windows 系统声音状态，如果已静音，则将其打开。
translations.changelog: Fully adapted the add-on for compatibility with NVDA 2026.
